name: Polar Fleece Hoody
description:
Lovely snug black polar fleece hoody, cropped body with bell sleeves.
Trimmed with cotton binding, fastens with three hooks and eyes on the inside.

A one-off item made to test a new pattern. It's too small for me, so my loss is your gain!

Length from neck to hem: 36cm (14¼")
Chest (overbust) measurement: 96cm (38")

Best fit chest 34-36".

name: Organic Cotton Fabric - Sample Set
description:
100% organic Fairtrade certified cotton cloth
Handwoven on traditional South Indian looms
Dyed using Global Organic Textile Standard approved dyes
Shirting weight (40/40)
Cotton grown from non-GM seed
122 cms wide
Colourfast and pre-shrunk

The colours in the photographs are only as accurate as my camera and your monitor will allow. This sample set allows you to see the colours and feel the fabric before you decide to buy.

You will receive a small square (approx. 10cm) of each colour.

Shipping for this product is to the UK only.

name: Organic Cotton Fabric - Pink
description:
100% organic Fairtrade certified cotton cloth
Handwoven on traditional South Indian looms
Dyed using Global Organic Textile Standard approved dyes
Shirting weight (40/40)
Cotton grown from non-GM seed
122 cms wide
Colourfast and pre-shrunk

You can state the required number of metres you require in the shopping cart. Whole metres only. Smallest cut is one metre, multiple metres will be sent as a continuous piece.

Please note that due to its handwoven nature, this cloth may contain small irregularities in both weave and colour. These do not constitute defects.

The colours in the photographs are only as accurate as my camera and your monitor will allow. If you'd prefer to see the colours before you order, please purchase a sample set.

Approximately 9 metres currently in stock.

Shipping for this product is to the UK only.
